head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PASSARETTI, ANTHONY J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PASSARETTI, ANTHONY J.

block.p: PASSARETTI-Anthony J. Beloved husband of Julia (nee Bonfiglio) father of Anthony Jr., Michael and Gerard. Father-in-law of Anna and Patricia. Grandfather of Andrew, Joanne, Jessica and Julianna Smith. Great-grandfather of Travis Smith. U.S. Army W.W. II. Retired Treasury Agent and N.Y.C. DA's Office. Member of Watergate Prosecution Force. Reposing at Martin A. Gleason Funeral Home, 149-20 Northern Blvd, Flushing, NY. Mass of Christian Burial, Mary's Nativity RC Church, Monday, 10:30AM. Visiting Friday, Saturday, Sunday 2-5, 7-10PM.
